caption: The image, provided by GoogleEarth, displays a section of an urban area with a train station located at the bottom of the frame. The surroundings comprise various buildings of different sizes and shapes, as well as a complex web of roads intersecting around the train station.

objects.referring_sentence: The train station is distinguished by an elongated structure at the bottom of the image.

qa_pairs.question: What type of area is featured in the image?
What object is situated at the bottom of the image?
Is the train station size large or small relative to the image?
